name: Dash On It
description:
NOTICE - This is a version of the game that I wanted people to see what they think.

DASH WITH IT - A platformer game that is basically just a test and is very bad.

I'm not good at C#.

Made with Unity2D!

The game is 21 minutes long!

In case you did not get a README.txt file in your installation, you can download it.
